description: Connect main menu dataset feature extraction and shape configurations to actively loaded preset or a loaded saved config, differences between them will cause shape mismatches in some of the projects lifetime. Also change tiny_conv mcu profile preset according to the new calculations of models fitting probability into esp32s3 mcu. Increase most important parts of a high quality model training without crossing those calculations. Assume esphome atom echo firmware will be flashed to atom echos i have
